      • assignCountries

        public void assignCountries​(CommandHandler p_command)
                     throws CommandValidationException,
                            java.io.IOException
        This method contans the logic to assign countries to the players and start a game loop to deploy the armies for each player.
        Parameters:
        p_command - Command entered by the player.
        Throws:
        CommandValidationException - the command validation exception
        java.io.IOException - the io exception

      • loadMap

        public void loadMap​(CommandHandler p_command)
             throws CommandValidationException
        loadMap method loads the map already present in the resources to begin the game. If the map doesn't exist it will throw an error message.
        Parameters:
        p_command - Command entered by the player.
        Throws:
        CommandValidationException

      • saveMap

        public void saveMap​(CommandHandler p_command)
             throws CommandValidationException,
                    MapValidationException
        Save map.
        Parameters:
        p_command - the p command
        Throws:
        CommandValidationException - the command validation exception
        MapValidationException - the map validation exception

      • editCountry

        public void editCountry​(CommandHandler p_command)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        CommandValidationException,
                        MapValidationException

        Parameters:

        Throws:

        MapValidationException

      • editContinent

        public void editContinent​(CommandHandler p_command)
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          CommandValidationException,
                          MapValidationException
        This method contains the logic to add new continent to the map. The player has to input the continentID and the continentValue correctly inorder to add a continent.
        Parameters:
        p_command - Command entered by the player.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        CommandValidationException
        MapValidationException
